title: Military watch

author: Bryson Kinder
comment: A recent update fixed the animations for my first gen moto 360. It is worth a dollar.

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content:
Hi Bryson
Thanks for you feedback and 5-star review! However it took too long to fix this bug and we are very sorry for that. We will keep working on this job and make more better watch faces!

Thanks!

author: David P
comment: Purchased it and and didn't have the option for a refund

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content:
Hi David 
Sorry for the inconvenience! Maybe it took too long after you bought this watch face. Good news, you can connect us through email acornsstudio@gmail.com and the order number.We can return the money. 

Thank you!

title: Refund

author: Carter Garcia-Kimura
comment: This app is using 9 percent of my watch battery, with ambient mode off and tilt-to-wake off. This is not okay for a watch face.

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content: Sorry for this unhappy experience. We will check it out asap!

title: Killing my Battery

reply.content: Thank you for you suggestion! Your information is very useful for us! We will fix this bug asap!
